title: Jeremy & The Satyrs  (1968/2009) [FLAC]
description:
Jeremy & The Satyrs - Jeremy & The Satyrs  (1968/2009) 

Genre: US, Psychedelic Jazz/Psychedelic Blues

Tracklist:

01. In the World of Glass Teardrops (5:23)
02. Superbaby (3:54)
03. She Didnt Even Say Goodbye (6:32)
04. Do it (3:01)
05. First Time I Saw You Baby (with Your Pretty Green Eyes) (3:31)
06. Lovely Child of Tears (3:56)
07. (Let's Go to the) Movie Show (2:43)
08. Mean Black Snake (5:19)
09. Cazonetta (2:26)
10. Foreign release (the Satyrs) (3:21)
11. Satyrized (3:38)

Personel:
Jeremy Steig - flute
Eddie Gomez - bass
Warren Bernhardt - keyboards,vocals
Adrian Guillery - guitar,harmonica,vocals
Donald McDonald - drums

First time on CD for this 1968 Jazz release. Jeremy & The Satyrs was a collaboration between Jazz flautist Jeremy Steig, bassist Eddie Gomez and keyboardist Warren Bernhardt. The band were a unique fusion of Jazz and Psychedelic Rock. They issued just one album on Reprise Records before going their separate ways, making names for themselves in the world of Jazz.
